description: EscrowEchidnaTest.deposit(uint256) (contracts/test/EscrowEchidnaTest.sol#40-53) ignores return value by dai.transferFrom(address(this),address(escrow),wad) (contracts/test/EscrowEchidnaTest.sol#48)
EscrowEchidnaTest.withdraw(uint256) (contracts/test/EscrowEchidnaTest.sol#56-68) ignores return value by dai.transferFrom(address(escrow),address(this),wad) (contracts/test/EscrowEchidnaTest.sol#64)

EscrowEchidnaTest.deposit(uint256) (contracts/test/EscrowEchidnaTest.sol#40-53) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- assert(bool)(dai.balanceOf(address(this)) == add(thisBalance,wad)) (contracts/test/EscrowEchidnaTest.sol#47)

EscrowEchidnaTest.deposit(uint256) (contracts/test/EscrowEchidnaTest.sol#40-53) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- assert(bool)(dai.balanceOf(address(escrow)) == add(escrowBalance,wad)) (contracts/test/EscrowEchidnaTest.sol#50)

EscrowEchidnaTest.deposit(uint256) (contracts/test/EscrowEchidnaTest.sol#40-53) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- assert(bool)(dai.balanceOf(address(escrow)) == oDai.totalSupply()) (contracts/test/EscrowEchidnaTest.sol#52)

EscrowEchidnaTest.withdraw(uint256) (contracts/test/EscrowEchidnaTest.sol#56-68) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- assert(bool)(dai.balanceOf(address(escrow)) == sub(escrowBalance,wad)) (contracts/test/EscrowEchidnaTest.sol#65)

EscrowEchidnaTest.withdraw(uint256) (contracts/test/EscrowEchidnaTest.sol#56-68) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- assert(bool)(dai.balanceOf(address(this)) == add(thisBalance,wad)) (contracts/test/EscrowEchidnaTest.sol#66)

EscrowEchidnaTest.withdraw(uint256) (contracts/test/EscrowEchidnaTest.sol#56-68) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- assert(bool)(dai.balanceOf(address(escrow)) == oDai.totalSupply()) (contracts/test/EscrowEchidnaTest.sol#67)

L1Dai.permit(address,address,uint256,uint256,bool,uint8,bytes32,bytes32) (contracts/test/l1dai.sol#122-144) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool,string)(expiry == 0 || block.timestamp <= expiry,Dai/permit-expired) (contracts/test/l1dai.sol#139)

Reentrancy in L2DAITokenBridge.finalizeDeposit(address,address,address,address,uint256,bytes) (contracts/l2/L2DAITokenBridge.sol#126-143):
	External calls:
	- Mintable(l2Token).mint(_to,_amount) (contracts/l2/L2DAITokenBridge.sol#140)
	Event emitted after the call(s):
	- DepositFinalized(_l1Token,_l2Token,_from,_to,_amount,_data) (contracts/l2/L2DAITokenBridge.sol#142)
markdown:
Reentrancy in [L2DAITokenBridge.finalizeDeposit(address,address,address,address,uint256,bytes)](contracts/l2/L2DAITokenBridge.sol#L126-L143):
	External calls:
	- [Mintable(l2Token).mint(_to,_amount)](contracts/l2/L2DAITokenBridge.sol#L140)
	Event emitted after the call(s):
	- [DepositFinalized(_l1Token,_l2Token,_from,_to,_amount,_data)](contracts/l2/L2DAITokenBridge.sol#L142)
